River Queen attempts to pack a complicated, sweeping, historical narrative into just under two hours. There are some breathtaking battle scenes and the Wanganui scenery is beautiful, well suited to the lush tragedies on offer throughout.

The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert.
